name: Éclaircies
description:
You only need a keyboard to play.

You can move using A and D or the left and right arrows.
If you need to change the inputs you can do so by clicking on the Input tab showed when launching the game.

The game can take some time to load as the whole forest needs to be generated.

Improvements will be made during the week.

A linux build should be ready in the coming days.

Recordings made by Marie Muller.
